text.language: Efec~mou e~ron n~je V]: tennac~mou e~pefran e#y#u#: n~c/ou niben e~re pefc~mou: naswpi efm/n e~bol qen rwn.
May God bless us / and let us bless His holy name / and may His praise / be always on our lips.
Kiranya Allah memberkati kita / dan marilah berkati Nama-Nya yang Kudus/ dan kiranya pujian-Nya / selalu ada di mulut kita.
يباركنا الله ولنبارك إسمه القدوس فى كل حين تسبحته دائمة فى أفواهنا.
